name: UnifiControl
0:
”Alexa, set the master bedroom to 20 percent.”
”Alexa, turn the front porch light off.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Enables Alexa control for Unifi ZigBee IoT products at https://unifi-enterprise.nimbus9.io. Control ZigBee switches, lights, and relays which have already been commissioned to the Unifi Control platform and added to Unifi Areas.

All account types can use this skill.
